name: A Little Off the Top
criteria: Unexpectedly decapitate someone or something.

name: A Pirate's Life For Me
criteria: Successfully steal a plot or adventure hook from a movie, book, or video game without getting caught.

name: Against All Odds
criteria: Critical success when it mattered most.

name: Ash to Ash
criteria: Comitted Arson.

name: Background DM
criteria: As the DM, you haven't said a word for 10 minutes while your players are engaged and roleplaying a scene.

name: Badges
criteria: Earn no other badges for the entire year.

name: Best of the Best of the Best, Sir!
tooltip: Best of the Best of the Best, Sir!
criteria: Get a 30 or higher on any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

name: Blame It All On My Roots
tooltip: Blame It All On My Roots
criteria: Player roleplays in character and it affects them negatively.

name: Broke the Plot
criteria: Broke the Plot in some way -- Up to DM discretion.

name: Captain Planet
criteria: Take damage from 5 different damage types in a single session.

name: Cash Is King
criteria: Bribed your way out of a sticky situation.

name: Classic Encounter Level I
criteria: Defeat a gelatinous cube.

name: Classic Encounter Level II
criteria: Defeat a mind flayer.

name: Classic Encounter Level III
criteria: Defeat a beholder.

name: Classic Encounter Level IV
criteria: Defeat an Ancient Red Dragon.

name: Cleaved in Twain
criteria: Cut someone in half.

name: Conspiracy Theorist
criteria: Believed in something that is obviously untrue.

name: Crafting I
criteria: Spellcraft -- Make spell cards.

name: Crafting II
criteria: Artistry -- Create a custom character portrait.

name: Crafting III
criteria: Engineering -- Create custom tokens.

name: Crafting IV
criteria: Terraforming -- Build some terrain.

name: Crafting V
criteria: Mining -- Paint and design some miniature bases.

name: Crafting VI
criteria: Tailoring -- Make a custom dice bag.

name: Crafting VII
criteria: Alchemy -- Paint a minature.

name: Curses!!!
criteria: Convince a player to attune to a cursed item.

name: Debt Collector
criteria: Use violence to collect a debt.

name: Double Dragon
criteria: With disadvatage, roll two natural 20s.

name: Down You Go!
criteria: Got the Final Blow on a Boss.

name: Dragon in a Dungeon
criteria: As a DM, have your players fight a Dragon in a Dungeon.

name: Dropped A Bomb
criteria: Deal 50 or more damage to five or more enemies with a single attack

name: Dust to Dust
criteria: Disintegrate something.

name: Evolution
criteria: Solve a problem in a way that impresses your DM.

name: Form Over Function
criteria: Choose to wear armor that looks ridiculous but is quite useful.

name: Frailty They Name Is...
criteria: Experience a Total Party Kill.

name: Frankenstein's Monster
criteria: Engage in necromancy.

name: Fumble Bee
criteria: Fail every roll for an entire session.

name: Fun While It Lasted
criteria: Retire from adventuring.

name: Game Master
criteria: Run ten sessions as the Game Master (DM).

name: Gaslight
criteria: Successfully gaslight your players.

name: Guess I'll Just Die
criteria: Critical failture when it mattered most.

name: Han Shot First
criteria: Attack an enemy while they are in mid-sentence.

name: Here Comes the Comet
criteria: Join a cult.

name: Here Lassie, Here Girl
criteria: Kill a believed party pet. Doesn't have to be an animal.

name: How the Turns Have Tabled
criteria: As a DM, have a guard charm a player and convince them to cover his shift.

name: HULK SMASH!
criteria: Roll Max damage on all damage dice in an attack.

name: I Am Become Death
criteria: Kill a player character twice in a single session.

name: I Am The One Who Knocks
tooltip: I Am The One Who Knocks
criteria: Kill a beloved NPC.

name: I Can Do This All Day
tooltip: I Can Do This All Day
criteria: Succeed on five death saves in a single encounter.

name: I CAST CONFUSION!
criteria: As a DM, Have players spend an entire session on a puzzle that should have taken 5 minutes.

name: I Cast Fireball
criteria: Hit your entire party, including yourself, with a damaging Area of Effect (AoE) spell.

name: I Didn't Hear No Bell
criteria: Take 50 damage from a single attack.

name: I Get Knocked Down
criteria: Character was stabalized after two failed death saves.

name: I Tried My Best
criteria: Tried your best but still failed. -- DM Discretion.

name: I Understood That Reference
criteria: Get one of Tarver's dumb references and compliment him on his dumb references.

name: I Want to Believe
criteria: Discover or witness a cryptid.

name: I'M THE JUGGERNAUT...
criteria: Enter a room or building through the wall.

name: If I Could Turn Back Time
tooltip: If I Could Turn Back Time
criteria: Travel through time.

name: IGHT...IMMA HEAD OUT
criteria: Run away and leave a party member for dead.

name: Is That a Zoot Suit?
criteria: Start a riot.

name: IYKYK
criteria: Get the joke -- DM Discretion.

name: Just a Flesh Wound
criteria: Lose a limb.

name: Knock, Knock
criteria: Open a door by breaking it down.

name: Level up! - 5
criteria: Reach level 5.

name: Level up! - 10
criteria: Reach level 10.

name: Level up! - 15
criteria: Reach level 15.

name: Level up! - 20
criteria: Reach level 20.

name: Minded My Own Business
criteria: Stayed out of a confrontation when you definitely should have intervened.

name: Nailed It
criteria: Get a 0 or lower on any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw

name: Nope!
criteria: Use a counterspell at a critical, life-saving moment.

name: Not Even My Final Form
criteria: Succeed every roll for an entire session.

name: Off the Rails
criteria: Completely derail an entire session due to random shenanigans -- DM Discretion.

name: Oh, Snap
criteria: As a DM, Have a player one-shot an important NPC.

name: Oops, I Did It Again
criteria: Accidentally kill someone you needed information from.

name: Participation Trophy
criteria: Manage to go the whole year without TRYING to get a badge and succeeding and get NO BADGES.

name: Pay Attention
criteria: As a DM, seamlessly weave a player's backstory into your homebrewed campaign plot.

name: Pettigrew's Path
criteria: Betray your friends.

name: Professional Cat Herder
criteria: Successfully manage a chaotic group of players.

name: Pupper Master
criteria: Be mind controlled or control someone's mind.

name: Red Shirt
criteria: Send an NPC into an obviously deadly and dangerous situation that ultimately results in their death.

name: Retconned
criteria: You got caught changing the past during a time travel event to fit a plan.

name: Royal Rumble
criteria: Punch a king.

name: Rule of Cool
criteria: Convince the DM to break Rules as Written in your favor.

name: Servant of the Scythe
criteria: Have three party members knocked unconscious during a single round of initiative combat.

name: Shall We Play A Game
criteria: Use AI. DM Discretion.

name: Shield Slinging Savant
criteria: Throw a shield at an enemy and cause 20 or more damage.

name: Shyamalan-ed
criteria: As a DM, throw a twist into a storyline that completely shocks your players.

name: So, When's the Next One
criteria: Run your first session as a DM.

name: Stay a While, And Listen
criteria: Run an entire session or storyline inside of a single tavern without leaving.

name: Sycophantic Sovereign
criteria: Become royalty.

name: That Was Quick
criteria: Have a character die at level 1.

name: The Gazebo Awakens
criteria: Find the mimic.

name: The Guild of Thesseus
criteria: Have every party member suffer a character death and re-roll a new character in the same campaign.

name: The Monkey's Paw
criteria: Attune to a cursed item.

name: The Unwitting Prophet
criteria: Form a religion.

name: Timid Tactics
criteria: Act like a coward.

name: Tomb Raider
criteria: Steal from a creature's final resting place.

name: Too Fast, Too Furious
criteria: Move more than 300 feet in a single round of initiative combat.

name: Training Wheels
criteria: Guide a new play in their first Dungeons & Dragons (or other tabletop RPG) game.

name: Wait a Minute
criteria: Get called out for using the wrong voice for an NPC.

name: Wall Hacks
criteria: As a DM, have your players complete a puzzle in a completely unintended and unexpected way.

name: Warp Whistle
criteria: Narrowly escape death by teleporting to safety in the middle of a fight.

name: Weekend At Bernie's
criteria: Raised the dead (necromancy) more than 5 times.

name: Wha...How?
criteria: Leave the DM speechless.

name: Whoops, My Bad
criteria: As a DM, create a situation where a player accidentally gets themselves killed (not through combat).

name: Why So Serious
criteria: Uncontrollably lose your composure during a serious scene.

name: Yes and...
criteria: As a DM, run a session that is nothing but roleplaying and talking -- no combat -- without anyone noticing.

name: You Have Chosen...Poorly
criteria: Get killed trying to use a cursed item.

name: You Shall Not Pass
criteria: Sacrifice yourself for the party in a grandiose manner.
